Reality distortion

Published on Jan 01, 2011 | By | Permalink

I took a bunch of pictures and edited them to be cooler than reality. On hiatus to focus on research, music, and people.

Because I release everything uncopyrighted, my photos are featured on extremely random websites (including The Atlantic, HuffPo, Matador, Outside Magazine and Gizmodo!).
